pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate the Spread of Ascochyta Blight in Chickpea // A spatiotemporal model that simulates the spread of Ascochyta blight in chickpea fields based on location-specific weather conditions. This model is adapted from a model developed by Diggle et al. (2002) doi:10.1094/PHYTO.2002.92.10.1110 for simulating the spread of anthracnose in a lupin field.
